item.title: TIL: Building a simple site using Hugo
item.description: Today I learned how to build a simple site using Hugo. For the initial setup, install hugo then create a new site. brew install hugo hugo new site my-website In the directory that has been created, initialise a git repo, and add the theme of your choice as a submodule. I chose this nice theme papermod. git init git submodule add https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod themes/PaperMod You can use hugo new to create a post:
